articles.author: George Steer, Mary McDougall
articles.title: Bond sell-off intensifies as long-term US yields hit 16-year high - Financial Times
articles.description: Yen and rouble also rocked by expectations that Federal Reserve will keep interest rates higher for longer
articles.content:
The yield on 30-year US Treasuries hit a 16-year high on Tuesday, as a sell-off in global bond markets pushed equities down and rocked currencies such as the yen and the rouble.
The 30-year US yield… [+3995 chars]
